electronic.description: array of the individual electronic convergences that happen as part for each step in the convergence study

kpoints.description: name of the input parameter that is adjusted within the job to find the converged total energy

energies.description: name of the property that is monited to determine convergence

criteria.description: convergence criteria to be applied to the property being monitored for convergence

formula.description: equation in python to evaluate whether the convergence criteria is reached

energy.description: energy at the end of each job
